text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus yoroensis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Honduras, Mexico, and Nicaragua.
text.Sources: Nelson, C. (1998). "Lonchocarpus yoroensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T37453A10056807. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T37453A10056807.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
